title: Optimizing Mathematical Data Analysis Using Voice Enhancement Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers learning practical approaches to apply voice signal processing technology linked to mathematical modeling in educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically explain the speech signal transformation process based on Short-Time Fourier Transform (STFT).
Learners can mathematically analyze the principle of multi-scale information extraction in the hierarchical residual U-Net++ architecture.
Learners can propose optimization strategies for computational efficiency by leveraging the mathematical properties of Atrous Convolution.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
